name: 7th World Congress on Dentistry and Maxillofacial Surgery
content: Attend the 7th World Congress on Dentistry and Maxillofacial Surgery in Dubai, UAE, on November 21-22, 2024\. This premier event will bring together leading experts, researchers, and dental professionals from around the world to explore the latest innovations in dental medicine and oral surgery. The conference will feature keynote speeches, interactive workshops, and networking opportunities aimed at addressing current challenges and shaping the future of dental healthcare. Whether youâ€™re a practitioner, researcher, or advocate, this event promises valuable insights and collaborative opportunities. Join us in Dubai for two days of cutting-edge discussions and impactful connections dedicated to advancing dental health.
